Activating my @HSBC_UK credit card:

1. Register for online banking
2. Discover I registered for it 13 years ago 
3. Enter username
4. Go to website to click forgotten username
5. Receive username
6. Log on with username
7. Enter security key from device thrown away 11 years ago

Activating my @HSBC_UK credit card:

1. Register for online banking
2. Discover I registered for it 13 years ago 
3. Enter username
4. Go to website to click forgotten username
5. Receive username
6. Log on with username
7. Enter security key from device thrown away 11 years ago
